select abl.id, abl.created_time, bbi.book_title, bbi.book_authors, bfi.book_cover_outside_url from book_file_info bfi left join account_book_link abl on bfi.id = abl.book_file_id left join book_base_info bbi on bbi.book_file_id = bfi.id
abl.account_id = #{accountId} and deleted = 0
and bbi.book_title like concat(#{bookTitle}, '%')
and bbi.book_authors like concat('%', #{bookAuthors}, '%')
order by abl.id desc
